title: Booty Giuliani, Lock HIM Up? 10.29.19
itunes:title: Booty Giuliani, Lock HIM Up? 10.29.19
description:
In episode 504, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Daniel Van Kirk to discuss the new upgraded AirPods, Rudy Giuliani's butt dial, John Kelly claiming to have warned Trump, Stephanie Grisham calling Trump a genius, Trump's speech about ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi's death, Trump being boo'd at the World Series, an Iowa being killed at a gender reveal party, and more!


FOOTNOTES:

  1. Apple unveils new in-ear AirPods Pro coming October 30 for $249
  2. Rudy Giuliani butt-dials NBC reporter, heard discussing need for cash and trashing Bidens
  3. MUST LISTEN: LEAKED RUDY GIULIANI BUTT DIAL VOICEMAIL
  4. John Kelly says he warned Trump he’d be impeached if he hired a ‘yes man’ as chief of staff to replace him
  5. White House: John Kelly 'was totally unequipped to handle the genius of our great President'
  6. President Trump on ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi: "He didn't die a hero. He died a coward." 
  7. In creating spectacle around Baghdadi’s death, Trump departs from Obama’s more measured tone on bin Laden
  8. Trump getting booed and enduring chants of "Lock Him Up" at the World Series is exactly the kind of content my heart desires. 
  9. Look how Trump’s face changes when he realizes an entire stadium is booing him
  10. Iowa woman killed by explosion at gender reveal party
  11. WATCH: Crumb - Part III [Official Audio]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
